<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Tomb Raider](/NPCs.aspx?ID=904)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Great treasure awaits those willing to explore the hazardous depths of the world's ancient tombs and forgotten dungeons. Some tomb raiders seek riches of bygone eras; others recover pieces of history thought lost to the sands of time.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Tomb Raider](/NPCs.aspx?ID=904)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 217</row>

**Perception** +13

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Architecture Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7, [Engineering Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +11, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +2

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Hazard Spotter** The tomb raider automatically attempts a secret Perception check to notice a hazard when they are within 10 feet of the hazard.

**Items**
[Climbing Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=14), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (20 bolts), [_+1 kukri_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 75

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_kukri_ +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +15 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Trick Attack** <actions string="Single Action" />  The tomb raider musters their guile to attempt a clever attack that catches their foe unprepared. The tomb raider chooses one of their weapons. The next attack with that weapon deals an extra 2d6 precision damage. In addition, the tomb raider can Interact to draw the weapon (or to reload it if they choose the hand crossbow).

</column>
